name: birthing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of producing a baby from your body, or of a baby being born: Birthing can be a shocking process for those who are unprepared. a birthing room the birthing process/experience See also
birth centre
birthing pool
birthing stool
More examplesFewer examplesIf home birthing can be safe then I have absolutely no problem with it.One of their goals is to revive traditions around child birthing and rearing.With my second and third birthings I educated myself and prepared for all outcomes. We believe that women should be able to make informed decisions about their birthing experience.She has been seeing a doctor who specializes in natural birthing techniques.The birthing room is like a comfortable motel room, but with doctors just down the hall.
